DOC.brief_summary: To compare refractive outcome patient 's visual quality bilateral cataract surgery implant multifocal intraocular lens , monofocal monovision hybrid monovision .
DOC.brief_title: Multifocal Intraocular Lens x Monovision x Hybrid Monovision After Bilateral Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate result randomize patient receive bilateral multifocal IOLs , monofocal IOLs monovision emmetropia one eye 1.50 D myopia eye , monofocal IOL dominant eye multifocal IOL non-dominant eye , evaluate visual refractive outcome , well independence glass bilateral surgery 1 year follow .
DOC.criteria: Bilateral senile cataract . Implantation IOL capsular bag ; Implants 1030 diopter ; Potential Visual Acuity ≥ 0.2 logMAR ( 20/32 , metric scale ) surgery ; Amblyopia ; Single Eye ; History intraocular surgery previous year ; Sequel prior ocular trauma ; Important Microphthalmia aniridia ; History damage corneal endothelium ( chemical burn , herpetic keratitis , corneal guttata ) ; Corneal astigmatism > 1.0 D ; IOP ≥ 21 mmHg standard caliper ; Ocular pathology affect visual function ( uveitis , diabetic retinopathy , agerelated macular degeneration , macular dystrophy , retinal detachment , glaucoma , optic neuropathy ) ; Pupil > 5 mm < 2 mm photopic condition ; Asymmetrical pupils eye eye ; Binocular vision absence ; Any situation endangers implant position capsular bag ( posttraumatic zonular weakness , pseudoexfoliation , example ) ; Patient probably need laser treatment retina ; Patients whose expectation unrealistic ; Patients whose lifestyle involve high expectation visual acuity ( writer , driver , example ) ; Patients risk meet clinical followup requirement ( distance travel difficulty , example ) ;
